Module roborally
Package game.gameObjects.maps

Class Map

java.lang.Object
game.gameObjects.maps.Map
public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
The map class helps in retrieving all the important aspects of the map either tiles from coordinate or coordinates from tiles.
Author:
Louis, Amulya

  • Method Details

    • readAll

      public void readAll()
      Reads all coordinates that initially need to be read.(Store belts, restart point, and antenna for the specific map)

    • isWallBlocking

      public boolean isWallBlocking​(Coordinate coordinate, Orientation orientation)
      Checks whether the antenna or wall is blocking the movement or not.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - coordinate of attribute where it needs to be checked
      orientation - orientation of wall
      Returns:
      false if there is wall blocking, otherwise true

    • getAttributeOn

      public Attribute getAttributeOn​(AttributeType type, Coordinate pos)
      This method retrieves the attribute from the coordinate in the map.
      Parameters:
      type -
      pos - position to be checked
      Returns:
      the attributeType

    • isAttributeOn

      public boolean isAttributeOn​(int pos)
      This method checks whether there is antenna or pit on the given coordinate.
      Parameters:
      pos - position to be checked
      Returns:
      true if there is pit or antenna, otherwise false

    • isAttributeOn

      public boolean isAttributeOn​(Coordinate pos)
      This method checks whether there is antenna or pit on the given coordinate.
      Parameters:
      pos - coordinate to be checked
      Returns:
      true if there is pit or antenna, otherwise false

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile​(int x, int y) throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Retrieves the tile from the map.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the tile
      y - y coordinate of the tile
      Returns:
      returns the tile
      Throws:
      java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when the position is not on the map.

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile​(Coordinate pos) throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Retrieves the tile of the given position from the map
      Parameters:
      pos - position of tile
      Returns:
      returns the tile
      Throws:
      java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when the position is not on the map
